#ASD it is just more common to like cursive more than block but can be the other way around (I like block print better personally)
#ASD oftentimes autistic children hate block writing but don't mind writing in cursive
#ASD Computers have been a major boon to those with ASD because they usually hate handwriting
#ASD There are two components to handwriting: the motor skill of holding the pencil (grip) and the visual spatial skill...spacing
#ASD Things like driving, team sports and even reading and writing can be severely impacted by collapsed visual attention
